Okay. Did you ever perform anything on him?
I've never touched him inten - intentionally. I've never laid a hand on him, not a body part, nothing, not a hair on my head. I never touched him.
Okay. When he did oral on you, were you still sixteen? Was this towards the beginning?
Yeah, it wasn't like, at the, at the end, like all this stuff was in the beginning.
